replies.bodyText:
The last one? I copied the name from setBlockState, because that's where it ends up.
That method says this: * @param maxUpdateDepth the limit for the cascading block updates
replies.author: shartte

replies.bodyText: Oh, also: where do the javadocs come from??? Is this also done via mappings?
